title: Why the US-Saudi relationship is withering — Timur Fomenko
description:
US-Saudi relations are withering because their interests are diverging significantly. The article provides a historical backgrounder. The interplay of geopolitics and geo-economics is on display.

RT (Russian state-sponsored media)
Why the US-Saudi relationship is withering
Timur Fomenko
author: contrarianmedia@hotmail.com (Mike Norman)
